Name: Cleric
Description: The Cleric is a magic-using healer who descends from an ancient line of religious healers.

Name: Custom
Description: Your Hero doesn't need any backstory other than what you create in your own head.

Name: Rogue
Description: The Rogue is a trained archer who left their village to seek out adventure.

Name: Warrior
Description: The Warrior is a skilled fighter with weapons and in hand-to-hand combat.

Name: Wizard
Description: The Wizard is an enigmatic magic-user, versatile in various forms of magic. A Wizard reigns destruction upon his foes from afar.
